question.content:
What is the output of the following code?
```python
for i in range(3):
    print(i)
```

sections.title: React Hooks

resources.name: React Hooks Guide
resources.description: An in-depth guide to using React Hooks.

sections.paragraph: This section covers the basics and advanced usage of React Hooks, including useState, useEffect, and custom hooks.

sections.title: State Management
sections.description: Managing state in large React applications.

resources.name: State Management in React
resources.description: Techniques and libraries for managing state in React.

sections.paragraph: Learn about different state management solutions in React, including Context API, Redux, and MobX.

question.content: Which hook is used to manage state in a functional component?

sections.title: RESTful APIs

resources.name: RESTful API Integration
resources.description: A guide on integrating React applications with RESTful APIs.

sections.paragraph: This section explains how to fetch data from RESTful APIs using tools like Axios and Fetch API, and how to handle asynchronous operations in React.

sections.title: GraphQL

resources.name: GraphQL Introduction
resources.description: An introduction to using GraphQL in React applications.

sections.paragraph: Learn how to integrate GraphQL with React using Apollo Client, and understand the benefits of using GraphQL over REST.

question.content: Which library is commonly used for data fetching in React?

sections.title: Code Splitting
sections.description: Optimizing load time with code splitting.

resources.name: Code Splitting Guide
resources.description: A guide to implementing code splitting in React.

sections.paragraph: This section discusses how to use code splitting to reduce the initial load time of your React application, utilizing tools like React.lazy and Suspense.

sections.title: Memoization

resources.name: Memoization Techniques
resources.description: Techniques for memoizing React components and functions.

sections.paragraph: Learn how to use memoization techniques, such as React.memo and useMemo, to optimize the performance of your React applications.

question.content: Which React feature helps in reducing the initial load time?
